result.translation: Mu by’ukuri (iyi Qur’an) ni Twe twayikumanuriye mu ijoro ry’igeno,

result.arabic_text: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
result.translation: Ijoro ry’igeno riruta amezi igihumbi (ibyiza bikozwe muri iryo joro birusha ibihembo ibikozwe mu gihe kingana n’amezi igihumbi)!

result.arabic_text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
result.translation: Abamalayika na Roho (Malayika Jibril) barimanukanamo babiherewe uburenganzira na Nyagasani wabo, kubera igeno (bazanye amategeko agenga) buri kintu cyose,
Iryo (joro ryose) riba ryuje amahoro (n’impuhwe za Allah ku bagaragu be) kugeza umuseke utambitse.
